result.execSummary:
The defendant Dohn Dennis Ermis Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
1:03 PM Defendant Dohn Dennis Ermis Jr in court, in custody.  Attorney Philbin in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Brad Hansen in court for Dohn Dennis Ermis Jr. 
Court calls cases 22CM14, 21CM97, 21CT18, and 21TR1729.
Atty Hansen provides plea form.
ADA heard on agreement.
Atty Hansen agrees.
Court arraigns Deft on Count 1 of 22CM14.
Deft enters a plea of no contest.
Court arraigns Deft on Count 1 of 21CT18.
Deft enters a plea of no contest.
Court arraigns Deft on Count 1 of 21CM97.
Deft enters a plea of no contest.
Court arraigns Deft on Count 2 of 21CM97.
Deft enters a plea of no contest.
Non-citizen advisory.
PleaQuest/WOR.
Constitutional rights.
Elements of offense.
Atty Hansen satisfied.
Factual basis.
Court finds Deft enters plea freely, voluntarily and intelligently; therefore court accepts plea and finds Deft guilty to Count 1 of 21CT18, Counts 1 and 2 of 21CM97, and Counts 1 of 22CM14.
ADA heard on sentencing.
Atty Hansen heard on sentencing.

Deft heard.
Court heard on factors.

Court imposes on 21CT18:
Payment of $300 fine + costs + DNA surcharge = $831.00 due at $100 per month beginning 10-01-2022 or civil judgment and referral to State Debt Collections.
$500 bond on deposit to be applied to fees due.
DNA sample due 08-16-2022.
Court imposes on 21CM97:
Count 1: 20 days jail, with good time and huber release.
Payment of costs + DNA surcharge = $443.00 due at $100 per month beginning 10-01-2022 or civil judgment and referral to State Debt Collections.
Count 2: Payment of DNA surcharge only = $200.00 due at $100 per month beginning 10-01-2022 or civil judgment and referral to State Debt Collections.
DNA sample due 08-16-2022.
Court imposes on 22CM14:
30 days jail, consecutive to the jail sentence in 21CM97, with good time and huber release.
Payment of costs + DNA surcharge = $443.00 due at $100 per month beginning 10-01-2022 or civil judgment and referral to State Debt Collections.
DNA sample due 08-16-2022.
Credit for 46 days time served.
Appeal rights.
Court dismisses outright 21TR1729.
1:34 PM

records.addlTxt:
11:45 AM Prosecuting attorney robert James mraz in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Dohn Dennis Ermis Jr appeared by video, in custody. Atty Spansail appears by video for bail/bond purposes only. 
Court calls case. 
Copy of complaint. 
Court reviews maximum penalties and charges. 
Deft updates address- 9352 Spruce Road, Suring, WI 54174.
Atty spks- deft qualifies for public defender. 
ADA spks on bond recommendation.
Atty spks on bond recommendation. 
Court imposes: $500.00 cash bond in addition to bond that has already been posted with standard conditions. 
Atty spks- likely that he will take case pending conflict of interest check. 
Deft spks on medical leave. 
Court advises deft to talk to staff at MCJ. 
Deft responds. 
ADA spks on information from Dr indicating that he needs medical assistance. 
Court inquires on documentation. 
Deft responds. 
Court advises deft to provide documentation indicating the need for medical attention to atty- will revisit bond at that time if needed. 
11:53 AM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.
